text: @SenSchumer Tell me how does tax credits for solar and wind or paying off post office debt, or ballot harvesting, or any of the other bullshit demands Democrats killed the bill for help those you proclaim to be fighting for with the coronavirus??

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
